About



COMPAS

COMPAS is a risk assessment instrument developed by Northpointe Inc. Of the 22 scales it provides, the Recidivism risk and Violent Recidivism risk scales are the most widely used. Scores are calculated using criminal history, jail and prison time, demographics and COMPAS risk scores for defendants from Broward County from 2013 and 2014.

Data Types: Multivariate

Default Task: Classification

Attribute Types: Categorical, Integer, Real

Format: csv

Number of Entries: 60843

Number of Attributes: 28

Year: 2016

Source: ProPublica Data Store - Extracted from Broward County Clerk’s Office, Broward County Sherrif’s Office, Florida Department of Corrections (2013-2014).

Attributes

  • Person_ID
  • AssessmentID
  • Case_ID
  • Agency_Text
  • LastName
  • FirstName
  • MiddleName
  • Sex_Code_Text
  • Ethnic_Code_Text
  • DateOfBirth
  • ScaleSet_ID
  • ScaleSet
  • AssessmentReason
  • Language
  • LegalStatus
  • CustodyStatus
  • MaritalStatus
  • Screening_Date
  • RecSupervisionLevel
  • RecSupervisionLevelText
  • Scale_ID
  • DisplayText
  • RawScore
  • DecileScore
  • ScoreText
  • AssessmentType
  • IsCompleted
  • IsDeleted
